definitions.definition: A semitropical evergreen tree, Citrus limon, that bears such fruits.
A taste or flavour/flavor of lemons.
A more or less bright shade of yellow associated with lemon fruits.
A defective or inadequate item or individual.
definitions.example: He didn’t realise until he’d paid for it that the car was a lemon.
A thousand quid for that motor? Do me a lemon, I could get it for half that.

definitions.definition: A piece of fanfiction involving explicit sex (named after the erotic anime series Cream Lemon).

definitions.example: You can start the vegetables cooking while you are lemoning the fish.

definitions.definition: Containing or having the flavour/flavor and/or scent of lemons.
Of the pale yellow colour/color of lemons.
